title: Add users to conversation
name: Add_users_to_conversation
description: Add users to existing conversation. Can select add to existing conversation or create new one.

Parameter.description: to existing one, true to make one new

title: Get all latest messages
name: Get_all_latest_messages_of_the_room
description: Get all latest message from the room

Parameter.description: MessageID of last message already shown. To get last 50 message put this param 0
